Brian Appleyard, Understanding the Present, Science works, but is it the truth?, p.2

"... whether we or more modest scientists like it or not, science possesses an intrinsically domineering quality. This kind of triumphant scientism is built into all science. Opposition tends to be subdued and demoralized to the point where we can no longer identify the damage done by these popularizers [Hawking, Sagan, Bronowski]."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Science Possesses an Intrinsically Domineering Quality
